EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_JK/Molina Hadoop Native SQL_Q416.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You're confirmed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/drive-operational-it-efficiency-with-hadoop-native-sql-analytics]]> Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar Molina Healthcare Drives Operational Efficiency with Hadoop Native SQL Analytics.
Please see current event details below:
Date: Tuesday, January 10, 2017 {{my.Save the New Date:default=Save the New Date}} Time: 10:00 AM PST / 1:00 PM EST
We will send you a link to join the session closer to the date of the webinar.
We look forward to you joining us!
The Pivotal Team
